sentences.en: ...the flora and fauna of the African jungle.
sentences.cn: …非洲丛林的植物群和动物群。

sentences.en: A vacant lot or a bombsite can, to the amateur naturalist, produce an extraordinary variety of flora and fauna.
sentences.cn: 对于业余博物学者来说，在一片空地上或被炸后的废墟里可能发现种类繁多的植物群和动物群。

sentences.en: A very toxic gas escaped and sported flora and fauna.
sentences.cn: 非常有毒的气体泄漏并影响到了动植物.

sentences.en: All of this unfolds into a panorama of beautifully balanced fauna and flora.
sentences.cn: 组合成了奇异的“动植物王国”.

sentences.en: In addition, there are abundant resources of wild fauna.
sentences.cn: 此外, 还有丰富的野生动植物资源.

sentences.en: Its rare and protected fauna species rank the 2 nd nationwide.
sentences.cn: 珍稀动物保护资源居全国第2位.

sentences.en: Limnology The scientific study of freshwater and its flora and fauna.
sentences.cn: 湖沼学:研究淡水及生长在其中的动植物群的科学.

sentences.en: Litter breakdown or fragmentation is due to the litter fauna.
sentences.cn: 落叶层粉碎的原因在于落叶层的动物相.

sentences.en: Pine Dam are a large number, the origin of ancient fauna.
sentences.cn: 千松坝还有数量众多 、 起源古老的动物群.

sentences.en: That country manifests an unbelievable luxuriance of and fauna.
sentences.cn: 该国展示动植物之丰富,令人难以置信.

sentences.en: The fauna in the Joli Fou consists of bivalves and arenaceous forams.
sentences.cn: 乔里富组内的化石主要是双壳类和砂壳有孔虫.

sentences.en: This fauna is associated with Foraminifera, sponge spicules and Brachiopoda et al.
sentences.cn: 伴生生物有有孔虫 、 海绵骨针、腕足动物等.

sentences.en: Wild fauna and flora are important integrants of ecosystem.
sentences.cn: 野生动植物是生态系统的重要组成部分.

sentences.en: Wild fauna belongs to Qiangtang inferior.
